name: I spent last week dismantling the mob (but enough about me, how was your weekend)
name_original: I spent last week dismantling the mob (but enough about me, how was your weekend)
description:
When the mob takes control of the city it's up to a guy who looks a little like a potato and his finger gun to make things right again!

This was made during the Boss Rush Jam 2023. The theme was "makeshift" and so our hero needs to collect stuff from his enemies to make himself some ammo. This is also my first game that can be played with mouse and keyboard, or a gamepad. 

Also- my first twin stick shooter.
